Schedule

Important dates (more info during the class)
  • Monday the 29th of April: Written exam (in-class)
  • Sunday the 19th of May: Project report deadline
  • Monday the 27th of May: Presentations of the projects
Overview
Useful links
Source Code

title: "Schedule"
execute: 
  freeze: false

::: {.callout-important}

## Important dates (more info during the class)
- Monday the 29^th^ of April: **[Written exam (in-class)]{.underline}**
- Sunday the 19^th^ of May: **[Project report deadline]{.underline}**
- Monday the 27^th^ of May: **[Presentations of the projects]{.underline}**
:::

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(googlesheets4)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
gs4_deauth()
d <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1B_KRL3Wc_81RpNvD6eNxGdaTFazhuqOpqQUyHmh1gqo/edit?usp=sharing")
```


```{r}
#| echo: false

d |>
  select(-dow) |>
  mutate(
    date = as.Date(date)
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_date(date, date_style = 31) |>
  sub_missing(columns = c(week, topic, lecture_pdf, lecture_qmd, lab), missing_text = "") |>
  cols_align(
    align = "center", 
    columns = c(week)
    ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "right",
    columns = c(date)
  ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "left", 
    columns = c(topic, lecture_pdf, lecture_qmd, lab)
    ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = "right",
      color = "#D3D3D3",
      style = "solid"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(date, topic, lecture_pdf, lecture_qmd, lab)
    )
  ) |>
  fmt_markdown(
    columns = c(topic, lecture_pdf, lecture_qmd, lab)
  ) |>
  cols_width(
    week ~ px(45),
    date ~ px(100), 
    topic ~ px(120),
    lecture_pdf ~ px(90),
    lecture_qmd ~ px(90),
    lab ~ px(120),
  ) |>
  cols_label_with(fn = function(x) {
      janitor::make_clean_names(x, case = "title") |>
        str_to_title() |>
        stringr::str_replace_all("^|$", "**") |>
        md()
    }) |>
  tab_options(table.font.size = 13) |>
  opt_row_striping() |>
  tab_footnote(
    footnote = "ðŸ“© Report submission at 23:59",
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = 2,
      rows = date == as.Date("2024-05-19")
    )
  )
```
